Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: BEAst: This document describes the BEAst profile, and how BEAst's order messages, version 3.1, for NeC, Rental and Material are linked to the Peppol structure. Peppol: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears. Values to be used are either urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:bis:order_only:3 or urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:bis:ordering:3

Element.Name: Order identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T3309 and T0034, Order/Calloff number. Peppol: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: Peppol: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order issue date
Element.Description: BEAst: T3310, order date. Peppol: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Order issue time
Element.Description: BEAst: T3310, order time. Peppol: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued.

Element.Name: Consignment order indication
Element.Description: BEAst: Order Type (T3100). In this version "220" is the only option. The blanket order ("226") is not yet supported by Peppol, so when you mean "226", this element shall be omitted and when you mean "220", the code "220" shall be sent. Peppol: Indicates wether the order is a purchase order or consignement order. Default is purchase order.

Element.Name: Document level textual note
Element.Description: Peppol: Free form text applying to the Order. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: BEAst: T6018, Currency code. Peppol: The default currency for the order.

Element.Name: Buyer contact
Element.Description: BEAst: T6005, Customer's Reference/Number. Peppol: The element is used for the reference of who ordered the products/services. Example being the name of the person ordering, employee number or a code identifying this person or department/group. Also known as "Buyer reference", and should also be sent in the corresponding invoice.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: Peppol: Used by the buyer to specify a reference that should be repeated in e.g. invoice to enable the buyer to automatically book e.g. to the right project, or account.

Element.Name: Order validity end date
Element.Description: Peppol: The end date for when the order is valid. The end date for the time period within which the seller must respond. An order should contain the validity end date

Element.Name: Quotation reference
Element.Description: Peppol: Reference to quotation which is basis for the order

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T6010, Reference to the offer. Peppol: A requirement to give a unique reference to the quotation that is the base for the order.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T6335, Reference to the customer's calloff/order. In the case a calloff/order is sent separately for material and service, the material calloff shall have a reference to the service calloff/order and vice versa. Peppol: Used to reference the initial order that was rejected and a new order is issued.

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T6221, Reference to the Ultimate customer's order number. Peppol: A reference to Originator Document. To be able to give a reference to the internal requisition on the buyer site on which the order is based.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Contains the additional information that is defined by the DocumentType. Used for Package Label (T6368), Notification Channel (T6366), Notification Time (T6367), Notification Address (T6456), Offer GUID (T6485), Drawing number (T6222), Entry code (T6176), Period of validity start (T6400), Period of validity end (T6401), Vehicle attribute value (T6346), Instructions (T6393), Document name (T6484). Peppol: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to specify the type of information sent in ID and in some cases a related code. The format is "BEAST:", followed by the identification about what data is sent, then a ":" followed by the related code. See the example. If no code is used the two last parts are omitted. "BEAST:PackageLabel", "BEAST:NotificationChannel", "BEAST:NotificationTime", "BEAST:NotificationAddress", "BEAST:OfferGUID", "BEAST:DrawingNumber", "BEAST:EntryCode", "BEAST:PeriodOfValidityStart", "BEAST:PeriodOfValidityEnd", "BEAST:VehicleAttribute:" plus the value of the code (T6345), "BEAST:Instructions" (T6393), Document type External (T6473). Peppol: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: BEAst: Embedded Document Binary Object (T6475). Filename is linked to Embedded Document File Name (T6476). Peppol: The attached document embeded as binary object, coded as Base64. The binary object has two supplementary components: a Mime Code, which specifies the Mime type of the attachment and a Filename that is provided by (or on behalf of) the sender of the document

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document filename
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Peppol: Reference to external document

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: BEAst: Link to Related Document (T6187) or Instructions URL (T6392) depending on value in DocumentType. Peppol: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contract information
Element.Description: Peppol: Reference to contract

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Reference to Agreement or Contract (T0007). Peppol: Positive identification of the reference such as a unique identifier.

Element.Name: Project reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Project number (T6004). Peppol: The identification of the project the order refers to.

Element.Name: Buyer information
Element.Description: Peppol: Description of buyer

Element.Name: Buyer party electronic address
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the buyer party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0008 or T6001, the identity of the buyer. Only one identification of the buyer will be used. Peppol: An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the buyer. Peppol: Name of buyer The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Peppol: Postal address of the buyer

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: T5003, Street name/number or Postbox number of the buyer. Peppol: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: Peppol: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for any other additional address information to the buyer. Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: T5007, country code. Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Peppol: Buyer tax information

Element.Name: Buyer TAX identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0099, VAT identification number. Peppol: The buyers registered Value Added Tax identifier. To be stated in case reverse charge is to apply to the purchase.
Peppol: Mandatory element. E.g. "VAT" or "GST"

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration name
Element.Description: Peppol: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Peppol: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact information
Element.Description: Peppol: Buyer contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5012, Contact person name. Peppol: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Seller information
Element.Description: Peppol: Description of seller

Element.Name: Seller party electronic address
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the seller party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0009 or T6001, Identification of the supplier. Only one identification of the seller will be used. Peppol: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Peppol: Name of seller

Element.Name: Seller party trading name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the supplier. Peppol: The trading name of the party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Peppol: Postal address of the Seller

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: T5003, Street name/number or Postbox of the supplier. Peppol: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6117, Postal Zone. Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: Peppol: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for all other additional address information. Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration name
Element.Description: Peppol: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Sellers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Peppol: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Peppol: Seller contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5012, Contact name. Peppol: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Originator party
Element.Description: BEAst: This party is re-defined by BEAst to be the Ship-from Location. In BEAst version 3.1 both the Ship-from Location and the Originator Customer party are used. Between these two BEAst have prioritized the Ship-from Location. Peppol: Information regarding the originator of the order

Element.Name: Party information
Element.Description: Peppol: Description of the originator party

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Peppol: Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Originator identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0129 or T6001, identification of the Ship-from Location. Only one of the identities will be used. Peppol: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Peppol: Name of the originator

Element.Name: Originator name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001 or T6324/T6325/T6424, Name or coordinates separated with "/". For coordinates use the format WGS84, degrees with decimals. Peppol: The name of the party.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Peppol: The originators contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: Peppol: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: Peppol: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: Peppol: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Invoicee party
Element.Description: Peppol: Information regarding the receiver of the invoice based on the order (Invoicee)

Element.Name: Party information
Element.Description: Peppol: Description of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee party electronic address
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the invoicee party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Peppol: Identification of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0085 or T6001, Identity of the Invoicee. Use only one identity on the partner. Peppol: An identifer for the invoicee party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Invoicee name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the Invoicee. Peppol: The name of the party who should be invoiced for the ordered items (invoicee).

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Peppol: Postal address of the invoicee

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box of the Invoicee. Peppol: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6117, Postal Zone. Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: Peppol: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for all other additional address information. Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: Peppol: Tax information of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee TAX identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T6030, VAT Identification number. Peppol: The invoicees registered Value Added Tax identifier
Peppol: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST"

Element.Name: Party legal entity
Element.Description: Peppol: Legal information of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee's Legal registration name
Element.Description: Peppol: The official name of the invoicee party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Company identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: Peppol: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Peppol: Invoicee contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: Peppol: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: Peppol: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: Peppol: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: BEAst: T0036 or T6001, Identity of the Consignee. Only one Identity of the party will be used. Peppol: An identifer for the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: Delivery location name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the Consignee. Peppol: A name of the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box number of the Consignee. Peppol: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: Peppol: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for all other address information. Coordinates (T6321/T6322) are given in format WGS84, degrees with decimals, separated with a "/". Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Requested delivery period
Element.Description: BEAst: The Requested Delivery Period should be set at line level, not here. Peppol:

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: Peppol: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.Format ="YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: Peppol: The time at which this period begins. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: Peppol: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.Format ="YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: Peppol: The time at which this period end. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Peppol: Identification of the delivery party. The party to whom the goods are delivered

Element.Name: Delivery party identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0037 or T6001, Identity of the Delivery party. Use only one identity of this party. Peppol: In this BIS: The identifier of the party that should receive the ordered items

Attribute.Name: Deliver party registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the deliverparty identifier.

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the Delivery party. Peppol: In this BIS: The name of the party that should receive the delivery

Element.Name: Final Delivery address
Element.Description: Peppol: The final address for the delivery

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box no of the Delivery party. Peppol: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: Peppol: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for all other address information. Peppol: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact information
Element.Description: Peppol: Contact information for the delivery party

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5012, Contact name. Peppol: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Shipment identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Always set to "NA". Peppol: Element is mandated by syntax structure use value NA

Element.Name: Packing label
Element.Description: BEAst: Shipping Marks Consignment (T0086). Peppol: A text that the buyer requests to be printed on the packing labels.

Element.Name: Delivery terms identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Terms of Delivery NeB (T6710). Peppol: Delivery terms identifier, normally Incoterms

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: BEAst: Transport Information (T6008) or Unloading Instructions (T6343). Peppol: A description of special conditions relating to the Delivery Terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Place Terms (T6020). Peppol: The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Peppol: Payment terms for the order described in text

Element.Name: Allowance and charge information
Element.Description: Peppol: Allowances and charges for the order

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: Peppol: Indicator used to state if the following is an allowance or charge. true = Charge, false = Allowance

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: Peppol: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as a code. For allowances a subset of codelist UNCL5189 is to be used, and for charges codelist UNCL7161 applies. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Allowance and charges reason
Element.Description: Peppol: A textual reason for the allowance or the charge. Can also be its name. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: Peppol: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. To state 20%, use value 20.

Element.Name: Allowance and charge amount
Element.Description: Peppol: The net amount of the allowance or the charge exluding TAX.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: Peppol: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: TAX category code
Element.Description: Peppol: The TAX category code that applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: TAX rate
Element.Description: Peppol: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge. As this element is of data type percentage, please note that no %-sign should be used. To state 25 %, use value 25.00
Peppol: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Tax total
Element.Description: Peppol: Specification of expected tax amount

Element.Name: TAX total amount
Element.Description: Peppol: The total TAX amount that is "added to the document total w/o TAX". This is the sum of all TAX subcategory amounts. The expected Tax Total in the corresponding invoice.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Anticipated monetary total
Element.Description: Peppol: Estimated total amounts for the order

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Peppol: Sum of line amounts in the document.The total of Line Extension Amounts net of tax and settlement discounts. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total without TAX
Element.Description: Peppol: The "Sum of line amounts" plus "sum of allowances on document level" plus "sum of charges on document level". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total including TAX
Element.Description: Peppol: The total value including TAX. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Peppol: Sum of all allowances on header level in the document. Allowances on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Peppol: Sum of all charge on header level in the document. Charges on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Prepaid amounts
Element.Description: Peppol: Any amounts that have been paid a-priory. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Rounding of document total
Element.Description: Peppol: The amount to be added to the total to round the amount to be paid. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Payable amount
Element.Description: Peppol: The amount that is expected to be paid. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Order line
Element.Description: Peppol: Specification of order lines

Element.Name: Order line note
Element.Description: BEAst: Line Item Information (T6031). Peppol: Free-form text applying to the Order Line. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure. Is to capture any free form description related to the order line as a whole.

Element.Name: Line item
Element.Description: Peppol: Description of line item

Element.Name: Line item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Line number (T0051). Peppol: Identifies the Line Item assigned by the buyer, the identifier must be unique within the order.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: Ordered Quantity (T0039) and Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol: The quantity of Items for the Line Item. The quantity for the order line.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The unit of measure that applies to the ordered quantity.

Element.Name: Order line amount
Element.Description: Peppol: The total amount for the Line Item, including Allowance Charges but net of taxes. The expected line amount excluding TAX but inclusive of other charges, allowances and taxes.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Partial delivery indicator
Element.Description: BEAst: Indication that BackOrders are Permitted (T6724). BEAst value "160" is here "false" and "161" is here "true". The value "137" cannot in this version be used. Peppol: Indicates if the line items must be delivered in a single shipment. Default is that partial delivery is allowed (true)

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: BEAst: Project Number (T6004). Peppol: The buyer's accounting information applied to the Line Item, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Line delivery information
Element.Description: Peppol: Delivery information for the order line

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: Peppol: An identifer for the location to where the ordered line item should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: Order line requested delivery period
Element.Description: Peppol: Requested delivery period for the order line

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period Start Date (T6319). In this version it is not possible to specify the time (T6734), only date. Peppol: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period. Format ="YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320). In this version it is not possible to specify the time (T6735), only date. Peppol: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.Format ="YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Originator information
Element.Description: Peppol: Information regarding the originator of the order line

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Peppol: Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Order line originator party ID
Element.Description: Peppol: The party who originated Order.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Peppol: Name of the originator

Element.Name: Order line originator party name
Element.Description: Peppol: The party who originated Order.

Element.Name: Order line allowance and charges
Element.Description: Peppol: A group of business terms providing information about allowances or charges applicable to the individual order line.
BEAst: Only Allowances can be used with BEAst version 3.1, not Charges. Peppol: Use “true” when informing about Charges and “false” when informing about Allowances

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: BEAst: Special Service Description Code (T6719). Peppol: The reason for the line level allowance or charge, expressed as a code. For allowances a subset of codelist UNCL5189 is to be used, and for charges codelist UNCL7161 applies. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge reason
Element.Description: BEAst: Special Service Description (T6111). Peppol: The reason for the line level allowance or charge, expressed as text. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: BEAst: Percentage (T6228). Peppol: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the line level allowance base amount, to calculate the line level allowance or charge amount.

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Amount NeB (T6230). Peppol: The amount of an allowance or a charge, without TAX. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: BEAst: Base Amount (T6229). Peppol: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the line level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the line level allowance or charge amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Amount (T6235) and the Currency code (T6018). Peppol: The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but exluding TAX. Although price is an optional element in an order it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: Price Unit Basis Quantity (T6722). Peppol: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Name: Price discount information
Element.Description: Peppol: Information on discounts connected to the price

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: Peppol: Only discounts are allowed for the price, hence the only valid value is false (meaning an allowance)

Element.Name: Discount amount
Element.Description: Peppol: Discount amount connected to the price

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item list price
Element.Description: Peppol: The gross price of the item before subtracting discounts. E.g. list price.

Attribute.Description: Peppol: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item description
Element.Description: BEAst: Product Information (T6037). Peppol: Free-form field that can be used to give a text description of the item. A detailed description of the item.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: BEAst: Article Description (T6226). Peppol: A short name for an item. A short name given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Buyer's Article Number (T6022 or T0172 when T6317 = "BP" or Littera (T6417)). Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: The Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Supplier's Artcle Number (T0172 when T6317 = "SA"). Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Item specification reference
Element.Description: Peppol: Referece to an item specification document

Element.Name: Document reference identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Drawing number (T6222). Peppol: Reference to an external document (ID) when it is necessary to specify the details of the item.

Element.Name: Commodity classification information
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for multiple BEAst elements: SBMI Number (T0172:01), SÅ Number (T0172:02), Concrete Number (T0172:04), Number (T0172:07), Fuel Number (T0172:08), Configuration Value (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), BIM Model Name (T6433), GUID for BIM Identity (T6431), GUID for Object (T6455), Identity Type Code (T6440), Product Type GUID (T6441), Product Type Description (T6442), Customer Remarks (T6036), Customer Reference Number (T6005), Offer Number (T6010), Offer Line Number (T6459), Offer Line GUID (T6486), Ultimate Customer Order Number (T6221), Ultimate Customer Order Line Number (T6458), Shipping Marks Consignment (T0086), Rental Indicator (T6477), Expected time of return (T6479), Rental period Start date (T6312), Rental period End date (T6313) Rental time Quantity (T6478), Rental quantity code (T6425), Rental quantity Shift code (T6426), Excess (T6482), Reference to Article class (T6466), Source to Classification (T6467), Size per load (T6460), Delivery Interval; interval start (T6461), Delivery Interval; interval end (T6462), Delivery Interval; Calculated unloading time (T6463), Delivery Interval; Time for Unloading (T6464), Delivery Mark Instruction (T6002), Insurance (T6071). Peppol:

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: BEAst: When the class is not defined in UNCL7143 the listID shall always be set to ZZZ, listVersionID to BEAST and name identifies what the value is. The ItemClassificationCode itself contains the value of the element. Possible names are: SBMI, SA, AI, ME, CoClass, ConfigurationValue, GUIDIdentifier, BIMModelName, GUIDforBIMIdentity, GUIDforObject, IdentityTypeCode, ProductTyppeGUID, ProductTypeDescription, CustomerRemarks, CustomerReferenceNumber, OfferNumber, OfferLineNumber, OfferLineGUID, UltimateCustomerOrderNumber, UltimateCustomerOrderLineNumber, ShippingMarksConsignment, RentalIndicator, ExpectedTimeOfReturn, RentalPeriodStartDate, RentalPeriodEndDate, RentalTimeQuantity, RentalQuantityCode, RentalQuantityShiftCode, Excess, ReferenceToArticleClass, SourceToClassification, SizePerLoad, DeliveryInterval:IntervalStart, DeliveryInterval:IntervalEnd, DeliveryInterval:CalculatedUnloadingTime, DeliveryInterval:TimeForUnloading, DeliveryMarkInstruction, Insurance. ("SBMI" = Sveriges Bergmaterialindustrier, "SA" = Sveriges Åkeriföretag, "AI" = Återvinningsindustrierna, “ME” = Maskinentreprenörerna. When the class is defined in UNCL7143 the listVersionID and name should be empty. Peppol: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Item TAX category code
Element.Description: Peppol: The TAX category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line TAX rate
Element.Description: Peppol: The TAX percentage rate that applies to the line amount.
Peppol: Tax scheme. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Additional item property information
Element.Description: Peppol: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: BEAst: Name of the property or Heading for the BEAst Label. When NameCode is BEAST:Destination 1-8, the name shall contain the corresponding heading (T6347, T6349, T6351, T6353, T6355, T6357, T6359, T6361). Otherwise it is T6469 or T6446. or . Peppol: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property code
Element.Description: BEAst: .Identifies what the Name and Value contain. ListID is always BEAST:4.0. Possible values are: DeliveryUnit, Destination1, Destination2, Destination3, Destination4, Destination5, Destination6, Destination7, Destination8, UnloadingInstruction, ArticlePropertiesNeC + value in T0011, T6444+T6443(ListID). Peppol: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: Peppol: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: BEAst: The content is described by the NameCode. Can be the Delivery Unit (T6340), Destination Content 1-8 (T6348, T6350, T6352, T6354, T6356, T6358, T6360, T6362), Unloading Instruction (T6344), Article Property (T6470), T6452. Peppol: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: BEAst: T6457 (Property Compare Code) + T6706 (Measure Unit NeB Type in unitCode). Peppol: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: Peppol: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: BEAst: T6450 (PropertyValueId). Peppol: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Item instance information
Element.Description: Peppol: Information relevant to an item instance or shared by the items in the order line.

Element.Name: Item serial identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T3236, (Serial Number). Peppol: An identifier that is specific to the items in the order line.

Element.Name: Item lot information
Element.Description: Peppol: Information about the production lot which the order line items come from.

Element.Name: Item lot identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: An identifier for the production lot which the order line items come from.
